Description: The story is centered on a large family living in the same house. Let's try to paint the "balance of power". So, we have Raymond Wong and his wife, Sandra Ng, who is so immersed in domestic affairs, which does not have time to look after themselves, that pushes her husband to bring her into the house instead of his mistress (Sheila Chan). We have a brother Wong - Leslie Cheung, who behaves like blue, but claims he's straight. He hates his aunt (Teresa Mo) - cousin of his parents, day and night watching TV (Lee Heung Kam and Kwan Hoi-San), which, in turn, behaves exactly like a lesbian. And we have another brother in the family - DJ Stephen Chow, who every day gets himself on the new girl, but stops when he comes across in the way of some Holly Yoke (Maggie Cheung), fanateyuschaya from Hollywood movies and madly in love with Cho. And when he accidentally hits his head, losing memory and starting to behave unpredictably, torn between wanting to stay with him forever and finish it off at the same moment. But, of course, will end all is well, as is clear from the title.
